item.title: Who wins the 2026 national title? We predict the CFP bracket
item.description: It's never too early to look ahead to next season. Some teams look like easy playoff picks, but who rounds out the field?

item.title: Flagg, Knueppel, Edgecombe: Who is the NBA's No. 1 rookie in our midseason rankings?
item.description: With the NBA now at the midpoint of its season, ESPN analyst Zach Kram ranks the top 10 rookies based on their performance.

item.title: Midseason report card: Cooper Flagg 'better than advertised'
item.description: Halfway through a turbulent rookie season, here's what execs and scouts are saying about Flagg.

item.title: Don't be surprised if ... Cooper Flagg finishes as a top-25 fantasy option, Jalen Green averages 20 PPG
item.description: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from notable players such as Cooper Flagg, Jalen Green, Jonathan Kuminga and more.

item.title: 8 years, 5 schools and a career-threatening condition: The story of Tyon Grant-Foster
item.description: From heart troubles to an eligibility battle, here's how the Gonzaga forward kept his playing career alive.
